00019 #include <vector>
00020 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/format.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/property_tree/ptree.hpp>
00023 #include "sdr/fifi/fifi_control.hpp"

00025 namespace FiFiSDR {  
00026   class receiver_control_impl : public receiver_control {
00027   public:
00028     receiver_control_impl(usb_device_handle::sptr usb_device)
00029       : usb_control_(usb_control::make(usb_device))
00030       , have_abpf_(false)
00031       , abpf_(256,0) {
00032       get_abpf();
00033     }
00034     virtual ~receiver_control_impl() {}
00035 
00036     virtual void init(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config) {
00037       LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("firmware svn version_num=%d version_str='%s'")
00038                    % get_version_number() 
00039                    % get_version_string()));
00040       
00041       const double harmonic3rd_MHz(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.harmonic3rd_MHz", 35.));
00042       const double freq_3rd(get_nth_frequency(3));
00043       if (freq_3rd != harmonic3rd_MHz) {
00044         set_nth_frequency(3, harmonic3rd_MHz);
00045         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("3rd harmonic frequency old=%fMHz changed to %fMHz") 
00046                      % freq_3rd % harmonic3rd_MHz));
00047       } else {
00048         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("3rd harmonic frequency old=%fMHz not changed") 
00049                      % freq_3rd));    
00050       }
00051       
00052       const double harmonic5th_MHz(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.harmonic5th_MHz", 85.));
00053       const double freq_5th(get_nth_frequency(5));
00054       if (freq_5th != harmonic5th_MHz) {
00055         set_nth_frequency(5, harmonic5th_MHz);
00056         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("5th harmonic frequency old=%fMHz changed to %fMHz)") 
00057                      % freq_5th % harmonic5th_MHz));
00058       } else {
00059         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("5th harmonic frequency old=%fMHz not changed") 
00060                      % freq_5th));    
00061       }
00062       
00063       const boost::property_tree::ptree& config_presel(config.get_child("Preselector"));
00064       const boost::uint32_t presel_mode(config_presel.get<boost::uint32_t>("<xmlattr>.mode", 1));
00065       const boost::uint32_t pmode(get_presel_mode());
00066       if (pmode != presel_mode) {
00067         set_presel_mode(presel_mode);
00068         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("preselector mode old=%d changed to %d") 
00069                      % pmode % presel_mode));
00070       } else {
00071         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("preselector mode old=%d not changed") 
00072                      % pmode));
00073       }
00074       
00075       int counter(-1);
00076       BOOST_FOREACH(const boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type& entry, config_presel) {
00077         if (entry.first != "Entry") {
00078           if (entry.first != "<xmlattr>")
00079             LOG_WARNING(str(boost::format("tag '%s' not supported: expect 'Entry'") % entry.first));
00080           continue;
00081         }
00082         const size_t
00083           index(entry.second.get<size_t>("<xmlattr>.index",         counter++));
00084         const receiver_control::presel_entry pe(get_presel_entry(index));
00085         const receiver_control::presel_entry
00086           pentry(entry.second.get<double>("<xmlattr>.freqFrom_MHz", 0.),
00087                  entry.second.get<double>("<xmlattr>.freqTo_MHz",   0.),
00088                  entry.second.get<size_t>("<xmlattr>.pattern",      0));           
00089         if (pentry == pe) {
00090           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("preselector entry(%02d) old=%s not changed")
00091                        % index % pe));
00092         } else {
00093           set_presel_entry(index, pentry);
00094           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("preselector entry(%02d) old=%s changed to %s")
00095                        % index % pe % pentry));
00096           counter = index;
00097         }
00098       }
00099       // set default entry
00100       if (counter >= 0 && counter != 15) {
00101         const receiver_control::presel_entry pentry(0.0, 500.0, 0);
00102         set_presel_entry(15, pentry);
00103         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("preselector entry(15) changed to %s") % pentry));
00104       }      
00105     }
00106     
00107     virtual boost::uint32_t get_version_number() const {
00108       boost::uint32_t version_num(0);
00109       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0xAB, 0, 0, (unsigned char *)&version_num, 4) == 4);
00110       return version_num;
00111     }
00112     virtual std::string get_version_string() const {
00113       const size_t len(256);
00114       char version[len+1];
00115       memset(version, 0, sizeof(version));
00116       const ssize_t n(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0xAB, 0, 1, (unsigned char *)&version, len));
00117       ASSERT_THROW(n >= 0);
00118       ASSERT_THROW(size_t(n) <= len);
00119       return std::string(version);
00120     }    
00121     virtual double get_frequency() const { 
00122       boost::uint32_t freq21(0);
00123       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0x3A, 0, 0, (unsigned char *)&freq21, 4) == 4);
00124       return c2d<21>(freq21)/4.;
00125     }
00126     virtual void set_frequency(double freq) {
00127       const boost::uint32_t freq21(d2c<21>(4.*freq));
00128       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_out(), 0x32, 0, 0, (unsigned char *)&freq21, 4) == 4);
00129     }
00130     virtual double get_startup_frequency() const { 
00131       boost::uint32_t freq21(0);
00132       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0x3C, 0, 0, (unsigned char *)&freq21, 4) == 4);
00133       return c2d<21>(freq21)/4.;
00134     }
00135     virtual void set_startup_frequency(double freq) {
00136       const boost::uint32_t freq21(d2c<21>(4.*freq));
00137       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_out(), 0x34, 0, 0, (unsigned char *)&freq21, 4) == 4);
00138     }
00139 
00140     virtual double get_xtal_frequency() const {
00141       boost::uint32_t freq24(0);
00142       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0x3D, 0, 0, (unsigned char *)&freq24, 4) == 4);
00143       return c2d<24>(freq24);
00144     }
00145     virtual void set_xtal_frequency(double freq) {
00146       boost::uint32_t freq24(d2c<24>(freq));
00147       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_out(), 0x33, 0, 0, (unsigned char *)&freq24, 4) == 4);
00148     }
00149 
00150     virtual double get_nth_frequency(unsigned n) const {
00151       boost::uint32_t freq21(0);
00152       ASSERT_THROW(n == 3 || n==5);
00153       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0xAB, 0, n, (unsigned char *)&freq21, 4) == 4);
00154       return c2d<21>(freq21)/4.;      
00155     }
00156     virtual void set_nth_frequency(unsigned n, double freq) {
00157       const boost::uint32_t freq21(d2c<21>(4.*freq));
00158       ASSERT_THROW(n == 3 || n==5);
00159       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_out(), 0xAC, 0, n, (unsigned char *)&freq21, 4) == 4);
00160     }
00161 
00162     virtual boost::uint32_t get_presel_mode() const {
00163       boost::uint32_t mode(0);
00164       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0xAB, 0, 6, (unsigned char *)&mode, 4) == 4);
00165       return mode;
00166     }
00167     virtual void set_presel_mode(boost::uint32_t mode) {
00168       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_out(), 0xAC, 0, 6, (unsigned char *)&mode, 4) == 4);      
00169     }
00170     virtual presel_entry get_presel_entry(size_t index) const {
00171       presel_entry pe;
00172       ASSERT_THROW(sizeof(presel_entry)==9);
00173       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0xAB, index, 7, (unsigned char *)&pe, 9) == 9);
00174       return pe;
00175     }
00176     virtual void set_presel_entry(size_t index, const presel_entry& pe) {
00177       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_out(), 0xAC, index, 7, (unsigned char *)&pe, 9) == 9);
00178     }

00180     virtual boost::uint8_t get_i2c_addr() const {
00181       boost::uint8_t addr;
00182       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0x41, 0, 0, (unsigned char *)&addr, 1) == 1);
00183       return addr;
00184     }
00185     virtual void set_i2c_addr(boost::uint8_t addr) {
00186       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_out(), 0x41, 0, 0, (unsigned char *)&addr, 1) == 1);
00187     }

00189     virtual boost::uint32_t get_virtual_vco_factor() const {
00190       boost::uint32_t factor;
00191       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0xAB, 0, 11, (unsigned char *)&factor, 4) == 4);
00192       return factor;
00193     }
00194     virtual void set_virtual_vco_factor(boost::uint32_t factor) {
00195       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_out(), 0xAB, 0, 11, (unsigned char *)&factor, 4) == 4);   
00196     }

00198     virtual si570_registers get_si570_registers() const {
00199       si570_registers regs;
00200       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0xAB, 0, 10, (unsigned char *)&regs, 6) == 6);
00201       return regs;      
00202     }
00203     virtual si570_virtual_registers get_si570_virtual_registers() const {
00204       si570_virtual_registers regs;
00205       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0x3F, 0, 0, (unsigned char *)&regs, 6) == 6);
00206       return regs;      
00207     }
00208     virtual void set_si570_virtual_registers(const si570_virtual_registers& regs) {
00209       ASSERT_THROW(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_out(), 0x30, 0, 0, (unsigned char *)&regs, 6) == 6);
00210     }
00211 
00212     virtual void set_abpf(boost::uint32_t index, boost::uint32_t value) {
00213       const ssize_t n(usb_control_->submit_control(request_type_in(), 0x17, value, index, (unsigned char *)&abpf_[0], 512));
00214       ASSERT_THROW(n>0 && (n%2) == 0);
00215       have_abpf_   = true;
00216       num_abpf_    = n/2 - 1;
00217     }
00218     virtual bool have_abpf() const { return have_abpf_; }
00219     virtual bool abpf_enabled() const { return abpf_[num_abpf_] != 0; }
00220     virtual size_t num_abpf() const { return num_abpf_; }
00221     
00222     // double -> counter
00223     template<unsigned N> static
00224     double c2d(boost::uint32_t c) { return double(c)/double(1<<N);  }    
00225     // counter -> double
00226     template<unsigned N> static
00227     boost::uint32_t d2c(double d) { return boost::uint32_t(d*(1<<N)); }
00228 
00229   private:
00230     void get_abpf() { set_abpf(255, 0); }
00231 
00232     boost::uint8_t request_type_out() const { 
00233       return LIBUSB_ENDPOINT_OUT | LIBUSB_REQUEST_TYPE_VENDOR | LIBUSB_RECIPIENT_DEVICE;
00234     }
00235     boost::uint8_t request_type_in() const { 
00236       return LIBUSB_ENDPOINT_IN | LIBUSB_REQUEST_TYPE_VENDOR | LIBUSB_RECIPIENT_DEVICE;
00237     }
00238     usb_control::sptr usb_control_;
00239     bool have_abpf_;
00240     std::vector<boost::uint16_t> abpf_;
00241     boost::uint32_t num_abpf_;
00242     bool abpf_enabled_;
00243   } ;
00244 
00245   receiver_control::sptr receiver_control::make(usb_device_handle::sptr usb_device) {
00246     return receiver_control::sptr(new receiver_control_impl(usb_device));
00247   }
00248 
00249   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const receiver_control::presel_entry& pent) {
00250     return os << str(boost::format("[ %7.3f - %7.3f: %2d ]")
00251                      % pent.freq1_MHz()
00252                      % pent.freq2_MHz()
00253                      % pent.pattern());
00254   }
00255   receiver_control::presel_entry::presel_entry(double freq1_MHz,
00256                                                double freq2_MHz,
00257                                                boost::uint8_t pattern) {
00258     freq1_ = receiver_control_impl::d2c<21>(freq1_MHz*4.);
00259     freq2_ = receiver_control_impl::d2c<21>(freq2_MHz*4.);
00260     pattern_ = pattern; 
00261   }
00262   double receiver_control::presel_entry::freq1_MHz() const { return receiver_control_impl::c2d<21>(freq1_/4); }
00263   double receiver_control::presel_entry::freq2_MHz() const { return receiver_control_impl::c2d<21>(freq2_/4); }
00264
